DOC.brief_summary: Healthy volunteer ingest 13C-octaoate contain test meal 13C expiratory air follow . Normal value calculate data test .
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical study establish reference value 13C-octanoate breath test 13C-sodium acetate breath test . Healthy volunteer ( n=75 ) eat solid test meal scramble egg toast contain 13C-octanoate . 13C-content exhale air measure baseline follow next 4 hour . One week later , healthy volunteer ( n=75 ) drink standardized nutritional shake ( Ensure Plus Vanille , Abbott ) contain 13C-sodium acetate . 13C-content exhale air measure baseline next 4 hour . Estimated gastric emptying time calculate use establish algorithm .
DOC.criteria: Subjects free relevant abdominal complaint Written inform consent Age 18 Previous history gastrointestinal disease surgery ( excludes appendectomy , hernia repair anorectal disorder ) Known diabetes mellitus , scleroderma , neurological impairment major current disease Subjects unable stop medication alters gut function 1 week prior study , include anticholinergic , calcium canal inhibitor , beta blocker , prokinetics , protonpump inhibitor , DDVIVInhibitors , Inkretinmimetica , nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug , macrolid antibiotic Pregnancy beyond week 12 ( pregnancy test perform ) Involvement clinical trial course trial , within period 14 day prior begin 14 day completion Known allergy intolerance hen egg protein gluten
